hero.name: Amine MEKKI
hero.tagline: I’m a Machine Learning Engineer specializing in building and solving complex Data Science and Machine Learning projects. Currently, I’m looking for new opportunities in Data Science and Machine Learning.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Machine Learning Engineer with experience in using data science and machine learning in healthcare, manufacturing, and meteorology. I have created ML models, set up MLOps pipelines, and used language models to automate report writing. I enjoy solving problems and am looking for a role where I can keep learning, contribute, and make a difference.
about.technologies: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I’m currently looking for a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer role. My inbox is always open. Whether you are interested in my profile, have a question or just want to say hi. Feel free to reach out.
